name: py-pythonsollya

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

homepage: Python wrapper for the Sollya library
description: Python wrapper for the Sollya library

dependencies.name: libffi
dependencies.description:
The libffi library provides a portable, high level programming interface
to various calling conventions. This allows a programmer to call any
function specified by a call interface description at run time.

dependencies.name: mpfi
dependencies.description: Library for arbitrary precision interval arithmetic based on MPFR

dependencies.name: py-bigfloat
dependencies.description:
Arbitrary-precision correctly-rounded floating-point arithmetic, via
MPFR.

dependencies.name: py-cython
dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: sollya
dependencies.description:
Sollya is both a tool environment and a library for safe floating-point
code development. It is particularily targeted to the automatized
implementation of mathematical floating-point libraries (libm). Amongst
other features, it offers a certified infinity (supremum) norm and a
fast Remez algorithm.
